definitions.example: It is the decision of the court that movies are protected as free speech.
After agonizing deliberations, they finally proceeded with decision.

definitions.definition: (chiefly combat sports) A result arrived at by the judges when there is no clear winner at the end of the contest.
definitions.example: He has won twice by knockout, once by decision.

definitions.definition: A win or a loss awarded to a pitcher.
To defeat an opponent by a decision of the judges, rather than by a knockout
